hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
source /home/test/.bashrc # Install dependencies sudo yum install -y git subversion make gcc-c++ tar wget sudo yum install -y ncurses-devel patch zlib-devel bzip2-devel xz openssl-devel sudo yum install -y autoconf perl-devel #sudo yum install -y git subversion make gcc-c++ tar wget ncurses-devel patch zlib-devel bzip2-devel xz openssl-devel autoconf perl-devel
export JENKINS_HOME=`pwd`
# Clone depot-tools and set PATH cd $JENKINS_HOME git clone https://chromium.googlesource.com/chromium/tools/depot_tools.git export PATH=$(pwd)/depot_tools:$PATH export VPYTHON_BYPASS="manually managed python not supported by chrome operations"
#Install Python 2.7.11 cd $JENKINS_HOME wget https://www.python.org/ftp/python/2.7.11/Python-2.7.11.tar.xz tar -xf Python-2.7.11.tar.xz cd Python-2.7.11 ./configure --prefix=/usr/local --exec-prefix=/usr/local make sudo make install python --version
# Install git 2.2.1 cd $JENKINS_HOME wget https://github.com/git/git/archive/v2.2.1.tar.gz tar -xf v2.2.1.tar.gz cd git-2.2.1 make configure && ./configure --prefix=/usr --without-tcltk make NO_GETTEXT=1 && sudo make install NO_GETTEXT=1 git --version
#Obtain the V8 source code cd $JENKINS_HOME git clone git://github.com/ibmruntimes/v8z cd v8z git checkout 3.28-s390
# Fetch source code for dependent lbraries make dependencies
# Build v8 make s390x -j4
# Build v8 with shared libraries make s390x -j4 library=shared
# Cross checking generated files rm -rf include_headers_test.txt executables_test.txt lib_headers_test.txt cat <<EOT >> include_headers_test.txt libplatform v8-debug.h v8-platform.h v8-profiler.h v8-testing.h v8-util.h v8.h v8config.h v8stdint.h EOT
cat <<EOT >> executables_test.txt libicui18n.so libicuuc.so libv8.so EOT
cat <<EOT >> lib_headers_test.txt libicudata.a libicui18n.a libicui18n.so libicuuc.a libicuuc.so EOT
ls include/ | tee include_headers.txt ls out/s390x.release/lib.target/ | tee executables.txt ls out/s390x.release/obj.target/third_party/icu | tee lib_headers.txt
result_include_headers=`diff include_headers.txt include_headers_test.txt`
if [ -z "$result_include_headers" ] ; then echo "include_headers are generated" else exit 1 fi
result_executables=`diff executables.txt executables_test.txt`
if [ -z "$result_executables" ] ; then echo "executables are generated" else exit 1 fi result_lib_headers=`diff lib_headers.txt lib_headers_test.txt`
if [ -z "$result_lib_headers" ] ; then echo "lib_headers are generated" else exit 1 fi
# Install V8 header files
sudo cp -vR include/* /usr/include/ sudo chmod -f 644 /usr/include/v8*h /usr/include/libplatform/libplatform.h
sudo cp -v out/s390x.release/lib.target/lib*.so /usr/local/lib64/ sudo chmod -v 755 /usr/local/lib64/libv8.so sudo cp -v out/s390x.release/obj.target/tools/gyp/lib*.a /usr/local/lib64/
sudo cp -v out/s390x.release/obj.target/third_party/icu/lib*.a /usr/local/lib64/ sudo chmod -v 755 /usr/local/lib64/libicu*.so sudo chmod -v 644 /usr/local/lib64/libv8*.a /usr/local/lib64/libicu*.a
sudo ldconfig -v
# Verify version of shell $JENKINS_HOME/v8z/out/s390x.release/shell
